stable.changelog:
- (FIX) Video player not opening in MIUI 12.x
- (FIX) Transparent theme flickers in Android 12
- (FIX|WIP) Some image formats not displayed in albums
- (IMP) Monet theme color extraction
- (IMP) Isolation (If you are not on Android 12, strange colors will not be used like in Google apps)
- (OTR) Adapted some things for alternative version
- (OTR) OTA changelog support HTML format
- (OTR) Update translations
